head.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Integrate {{ProdFullName}} into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects to easily join {{FileFormatUp}} files.

header.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to build {{EnvNameShort}} applications that efficiently join {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive document processing solution. It supports over 50 formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives, allowing you to join, split, extract, swap, and remove pages effortlessly.

more_features.title: Tools for document joining
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports 50+ commonly used business file formats and provides extensive document manipulation features.

feature_1.title: Join multiple document formats
feature_1.content: Easily join PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Choose specific pages to include as needed.

feature_2.title: Modify document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange, delete, or swap pages within your business documents to structure them according to your needs.

feature_3.title: Customize page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and adjust their orientation between landscape and portrait for supported file types.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages, saving them as a new document.

formats.title: Join different file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} handles over 50 file formats, enabling seamless business document processing.

examples.comment_1: Create a {{NameProduct}} instance with the input {{FileFormatUp}} document
examples.comment_2: Join the file with another document
examples.comment_3: Save the joined file to the specified location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to join {{FileFormatUp}} files effortlessly. Integrate this feature into your {{EnvName}} applications to handle multiple documents as a single file.
content.step_1: Set the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_4: Join the documents and save the output file.

code_1.title: Join selected pages from files of different formats
code_1.content: This example illustrates how to join {{FileFormatUp}} files while incorporating selected pages from other formats.
code_1.comment_2: Specify options to select particular pages
code_1.comment_3: Join the primary document with selected pages from another file
code_1.comment_4: Save the final joined document to the specified location
